articles.description: Snooker icon Ronnie O'Sullivan secured his seventh world championship to move level with Stephen Hendry for the most titles in the Open era
articles.content:
World snooker champion Ronnie OSullivan has revealed he will spend the prize money from his record-equalling seventh title by purchasing a rigid inflatable boat.

articles.content:
